posts.post_content:
T3 Turkey Red #10 Devlin (checklist back) for sale. Graded PSA4 (MK). Has had several small x's written and neatly erased in pencil on the reverse next to the numbers; in other words, used as a checklist. Somewhat difficult to see.
     Price-$260.00 delivered. Email reservations recommended. Check or money order only. Send payment to Ed Hans P.O. Box 307 Buffalo, N.Y. 14207. (716) 876-6359. [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Good luck and thanks for looking.

Scan added.

[IMG]http://www.thecybersource.com/~edhans/t3devlin.jpg[/IMG]

posts.post_title: Re: T3 Devlin for sale-Price reduced.
posts.post_content: Bump for price reduction and addition of scan.
